function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'sleep' to reach function 'say'?
Is there a call path from function 'stutter' to function 'putchar'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'dying'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'n < 2' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'n < 2' always executed?
Can the loop with condition '*s' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition '*s' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'n < 2' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '*s' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'speed (line 5)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'emotion (line 6)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 's (line 16)' live at the end of function 'say'?
Does variable 'sayingspeed' remain in use at the end of function 'say'?
dead_code: Can the program actually reach the statement: “++emotion;”?
